sources.title: The Poseidon Adventure (1972)
sources.description: The Poseidon Adventure follows the story of the SS Poseidon, an aging luxury liner that capsizes after being struck by a tsunami on New Year's Eve. A small group of survivors, led by Reverend Frank Scott, must navigate through the overturned ship to find a way to safety while facing various dangers and challenges.

metadata.Plot: A passenger ship, on her way to the scrap yard is pushed to her limits by the new owners to save on the dismantling fees. A tidal wave hits her, flipping her over so that all the internal rooms are upside down. A priest takes a mixed band of survivors on a journey through the bowels of the ship in an attempt to survive.
metadata.Writer: Stirling Silliphant, Wendell Mayes, Paul Gallico
metadata.Actors: Gene Hackman, Ernest Borgnine, Shelley Winters

relatedMovies.title: At Home Among Strangers, a Stranger Among His Own
